text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters If you think that’s news you should check out how Fox News covered Ebola vs COViD19.  Stark difference.  In fact, if you want to discuss media misinformation you should definitely include Fox News.  While all media push their agenda, Fox News is one of the worst.
